text_run.content: Zilliz Cloud offers two types of alerts for resource monitoring:

This topic describes how to view and manage organization alerts.
This feature is exclusively available to clusters in the Standard and Enterprise plans. For more information, see
Below is a table outlining the default configuration for each organization alert.

Monitor the remaining days until the credit card's expiration to ensure uninterrupted service.
Renew or update credit card information before the expiration date.
: Trigger alerts within 30 days of card expiration.
: Trigger alerts within 7 days of card expiration.
Track the balance of free credits, alerting the user when it falls low to prompt a top-up.
Top up credits to maintain account functionality.
alerts when the balance of free credits falls below $10.
Monitor the remaining validity period of free credits, alerting the user to encourage usage or extension.
Extend the validity period or use the credits before they expire.
alerts when the validity period of free credits reaches 0 days.
Monitor the advance pay balance, alerting the user when it falls low to prevent service disruption.
Add funds to the advance pay balance to avoid service interruption.
alerts when the balance falls below $100.
Track the usage amount, informing the user when it exceeds a set threshold to suggest monitoring and management.
Monitor and manage usage to stay within budget limits.
alerts when the amount of usage exceeds $100.
Monitor the percentage of used CPU cores against the total licensed cores.
: Continue monitoring to ensure core usage stays within this range.
: Assess future needs and prepare to renew or upgrade the license.
: Renew or upgrade the license immediately to avoid operational disruptions.
: Triggered when the count of used CPU cores reaches or exceeds 70% of the total.
: Triggered when the count of used CPU cores reaches or exceeds 100% of the total.
Track the remaining days of license validity.
: Continue monitoring to ensure more than 60 days of validity remain.
: Start preparing to renew or upgrade the license.
: Renew or upgrade the license immediately to avoid restrictions like the inability to create new clusters or scale up.
: Triggered when the license validity is 60 days or less.
: Available to any organization member if designated by the owner.
